title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 2158/87 of 22 July 1987 on exports of agricultural products to the island of Heligoland
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 2158/87
of 22 July 1987
on exports of agricultural products to the island of Heligoland
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Notwithstanding Article 9 (1) of Regulation (EEC) No 2730/79 and Article 1 (1) second subparagraph of Directive 81/177/EEC, agricultural products destined for the island of Heligoland shall be considered as exports for the purposes of the provisions for payment of export refunds.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 August 1987.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
